plot: Roos and Rana, two teenagers, are the biggest bosom friends. Both have a bad relationship with their parents and when things get out of hand, they decide to run away to Istanbul
title: Roos en Rana
plot_es: Roos and Rana, two teenagers, are the biggest bosom friends. Both have a bad relationship with their parents and when things get out of hand, they decide to run away to Istanbul
plot_en: Roos and Rana, two teenagers, are the biggest bosom friends. Both have a bad relationship with their parents and when things get out of hand, they decide to run away to Istanbul
